tables.name: IPRITEM
tables.description: Generated Table for View I_Purchaserequisitionitem: Purchase Requisition Item

fields.name: PURCHASINGDOCUMENTSUBTYPE
fields.description: Control indicator for purchasing document type

fields.name: MANUFACTURERMATERIAL
fields.description: Material number corresponding to manufacturer part number

fields.name: MATERIALGOODSRECEIPTDURATION
fields.description: Goods receipt processing time in days

fields.name: SUPPLYINGPLANT
fields.description: Supplying (issuing) plant in case of stock transport order

fields.name: ORDEREDQUANTITY
fields.description: Quantity ordered against this purchase requisition

fields.name: CREATEDBYUSER
fields.description: Name of Person who Created the Object

fields.name: MANUALDELIVERYADDRESSID
fields.description: Manual address number in purchasing document item

fields.name: MULTIPLEACCTASSGMTDISTRIBUTION
fields.description: Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment

fields.name: PURCHASECONTRACTITEM
fields.description: Item number of principal purchase agreement

fields.name: PURREQNSSPCATALOG
fields.description: Technical Key of a Web Service (for Example - a Catalog)

fields.name: RELEASESTRATEGY
fields.description: Release strategy in the purchase requisition

fields.name: PERFORMANCEPERIODSTARTDATE
fields.description: Start Date for Period of Performance

fields.name: PERFORMANCEPERIODENDDATE
fields.description: End Date for Period of Performance

fields.name: ITEMNETAMOUNT
fields.description: Total value at time of release

fields.name: ADDRESSID
fields.description: Manual address number in purchasing document item

fields.name: LASTCHANGEDATETIME
fields.description: UTC Time Stamp in Long Form (YYYYMMDDhhmmssmmmuuun)

fields.name: PURCHASEREQNITEMUNIQUEID
fields.description: Key to identify purchase requisition item

fields.name: SUBCONTRACTOR
fields.description: Supplier to be Supplied/Who is to Receive Delivery

fields.name: PURCHASEORDERPRICETYPE
fields.description: Use Requisition Price in Purchase Order

fields.name: EXTPURCHASEREQUISITIONTYPE
fields.description: PR Document Type of Connected System

fields.name: PROCMTHUBPURREQNITMISCHANGED
fields.description: Change Indicator for PR in Central Procurement

fields.name: PURREQNISVALDINCNTRLREQNPROCG
fields.description: Is PR relevant for Central PR Processing
